content.text: Match ends, Swansea City 0, Leicester City 3.
Second Half ends, Swansea City 0, Leicester City 3.
Attempt blocked. Andy King (Leicester City) right footed shot from the left side of the box is blocked. Assisted by Jeffrey Schlupp.
Attempt missed. André Ayew (Swansea City) left footed shot from the centre of the box is high and wide to the left. Assisted by Bafétimbi Gomis.
Marc Albrighton (Leicester City) is shown the yellow card for a bad foul.
Jefferson Montero (Swansea City) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Marc Albrighton (Leicester City).
Substitution, Leicester City. Jeffrey Schlupp replaces Riyad Mahrez.
Attempt missed. Christian Fuchs (Leicester City) right footed shot from outside the box is too high following a corner.
Corner,  Leicester City. Conceded by Kyle Bartley.
Attempt blocked. Robert Huth (Leicester City) right footed shot from the centre of the box is blocked. Assisted by Marc Albrighton with a cross.
Riyad Mahrez (Leicester City) wins a free kick on the right wing.
Foul by Neil Taylor (Swansea City).
Corner,  Leicester City. Conceded by Ashley Williams.
Attempt blocked. Danny Simpson (Leicester City) right footed shot from outside the box is blocked. Assisted by Andy King with a cross.
Substitution, Leicester City. Andy King replaces Leonardo Ulloa.

Attempt missed. Bafétimbi Gomis (Swansea City) right footed shot from the centre of the box misses to the right. Assisted by Jefferson Montero.
Attempt missed. Ashley Williams (Swansea City) header from the centre of the box misses to the right. Assisted by Gylfi Sigurdsson with a cross following a corner.
Corner,  Swansea City. Conceded by Robert Huth.
Gylfi Sigurdsson (Swansea City) hits the right post with a right footed shot from outside the box. Assisted by André Ayew.
Substitution, Swansea City. Jack Cork replaces Ki Sung-yueng.
Attempt saved. Bafétimbi Gomis (Swansea City) right footed shot from the centre of the box is saved in the centre of the goal.
André Ayew (Swansea City) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Daniel Drinkwater (Leicester City).

Goal!  Swansea City 0, Leicester City 3. Riyad Mahrez (Leicester City) right footed shot from the centre of the box to the bottom left corner. Assisted by Jamie Vardy.
Offside, Leicester City. Riyad Mahrez tries a through ball, but Jamie Vardy is caught offside.
